name: Balloons Pop Mania
description:
Welcome to Balloons Pop game, an addicting colorful puzzle game with 3 game modes, original gameplay and lots of fun for all ages. Your kids will definitely love this game and you will definitely enjoy it as well!

Submit your score at the end of the game to a global leaderboard to see who is the best and remember, more games you play = better overall score you get!

The game is 100% free and does not contain any in-app purchases.

**** General rules ****
Tap on a group of at least 2 balloons of the same color to pop them! Remember, bigger groups you pop, the better score you get! Collect extra points on your way.

**** Game modes ****

Challenge - there will be shown a "crush" number above the balloons and your task is to pop at least as many balloons as shows the crush number. Example: Crush number = 4, so you must pop at least 4 balloons in one move!

30 Pops - you have 30 pops available, go for highscores!

Timed - you have 60 seconds time limit, go for highscores!

**** Features ****

* Addicting puzzle game for all ages
* 100% free + no In-App purchases
* Global leaderboards included - compare your score with other people all around the world
* Submit current and overall score - more times you played = better overall score you get
* Simple to play but difficult to master
* Colorful design
* Each game is different

Have a nice time playing Balloons Pop and if you like the game and want to support it so please leave a review and rate the game. Thank you for your support.

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!
